sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  ProjectContainer, ProjectTitle, LinksContainer, GradientButton,
  Description, DemonstrationContainer, StepsContainer, StepItem,
  StepDescription, GifContainer, GifImage, Card, PillBadge,
  GradientBackground, CircleExpand, TextMod, GradientText,
  GradientContainer, AnimatedGradient, LineHeightText, HoverColorShift,
  DashedContainer, Subtitle, FlexRow, Divider, GlassCard
} from './StyledComp';

const Project = () => {
  const { title, websiteLink, githubLink, demoLink, description, demonstration } = dummyData;

  return (
    <GradientBackground> {/* The entire project has a gradient background */}
      <CircleExpand>ðŸ”µ</CircleExpand> {/* Circle animation in the corner */}
      
      <Card>
        <ProjectContainer>
          <FlexRow>
            <ProjectTitle>
              {/* Styled with GradientText and TextMod */}
              <GradientText>
                <TextMod size="2.5rem" color="#444" weight="bold">
                  {title}
                </TextMod>
              </GradientText>
            </ProjectTitle>
            <PillBadge>NEW</PillBadge>
          </FlexRow>

          {/* Centered links with GradientButton and AnimatedGradient */}
          <GradientContainer>
            <LinksContainer>
              <AnimatedGradient>
                <GradientButton href={websiteLink}>Website</GradientButton>
              </AnimatedGradient>
              
              <AnimatedGradient>
                <GradientButton href={githubLink}>GitHub</GradientButton>
              </AnimatedGradient>
              
              {demoLink && (
                <AnimatedGradient>
                  <GradientButton href={demoLink}>Demonstration</GradientButton>
                </AnimatedGradient>
              )}
            </LinksContainer>
          </GradientContainer>

          <LineHeightText>Line height sample text</LineHeightText>

          <DashedContainer>
            <Description>
              <TextMod size="1.2rem" color="#666" font="Verdana, sans-serif" weight="500">
                This is a <TextMod color="#444" weight="bold">sample</TextMod> project description. It explains the purpose and functionality of the project in brief.
              </TextMod>
            </Description>
          </DashedContainer>

          {demonstration && (
            <DemonstrationContainer>
              <GlassCard>
                <Subtitle>Demonstration:</Subtitle>
                <StepsContainer>
                  {demonstration.map((step, index) => (
                    <StepItem key={index}>
                      <StepDescription>
                        <HoverColorShift>
                          <TextMod type="italic">{step.description}</TextMod>
                        </HoverColorShift>
                      </StepDescription>
                      <GifContainer>
                        <GifImage src={step.gifImage} alt={`Demo for step ${index + 1}`} />
                      </GifContainer>
                    </StepItem>
                  ))}
                </StepsContainer>
              </GlassCard>
            </DemonstrationContainer>
          )}
          <Divider />
        </ProjectContainer>
      </Card>
    </GradientBackground>
  );
};

export default Project;
